title: Does Riot hate Fiora or the Fiora players?
body:
When I got banned from ranked for being so good and my main champ Fiora got nerfed I wondered that same question.

Does Riot just hate me?

Or does Riot just hate Fiora?

Is it both?

replies.body: There's no "Bronze players are delusional" option.

I could of beat any of your top 2016 LCS players with the old Fiora.   

Even with the typical team of afkers and feeders as teamates.
I think you just proved the above posters point...

no offense or anything.. buut.
